A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was horrible. The tone was completely different from the tone of previous movies in the series and even other media. Several main characters did things never before alluded to and completely out of character. There were story lines that did not contribute anything to the overall story and a very awkward scenes played for humor that landed flat. Flying through space like marry Poppins\, nearly nude force facetime\, Luke being totally broken\, really dumb prank phonecall\, and a potential child murderer as well as never getting into the action make this movie very bad. Will not watch anymore of these movies.
